page.title: 06YOXALL SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: Varied and numerous events are held. The main purpose is to raise money for charity. The annual events are : Spring Bank Holiday Fayre run by St.Peter's Church. August Bank Holiday Country Fayre at Goose Green by the Rheumatism and Arthritis Council. Marjory Armson's Christmas Fayre run by St. Peter's Church. Wood Lane Fete run by the Catholic Church in June A barbecue in June run by the cricketers In November a bonfire,fireworks and barbecue is run by the Forrester's Arms. In September the village churches join forces for a sponsered walk. The Women's Institute hold a mini-market and coffee morning annually.
